entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Backspace does not work properly when using Console.ReadLine() in Alpine #64355
  • Requested optimization when two registered services refer to the same target type #64351
  • [wasm] crash in the browser-bench sample with AOT #64343
    7.0.0
  • Add ReadMe to NuGet packages #64342
  • [API Proposal]: Add CancellationToken to TextWriter.FlushAsync #64340
  • NativeAOT for osx-arm64 #64337
  • [wasm] Test the templates in VS and VS for Mac #64336
    7.0.0
  • Generic attributes: Attribute.GetCustomAttributes returns null when passed an unbound generic type #64335
  • Add Microsoft.VisualBasic.Core support to Microsoft.Windows.Compatibility for .NET Standard #64334
  • [wasm] BrowserHttpHandler to support large/streaming requests via ReadableStream #64333
    7.0.0
  • [QUIC] ClientAuthenticationOptions.ClientAuthenticationOptions should provide some defaults #64332
  • PipeWriterStream.DisposeAsync should call CompleteAsync on the underlying pipe writer #64326
  • Runtime Exception in coreclr.dll (dotnet 5.0.13) #64323
  • NetworkAddressChange.Unix can start reading from unrelated handles. #64319
  • Update when Vector256<T>.IsHardwareAccelerated returns true #64309
    7.0.0
  • Unknown socket error #64305

Closed

  • NullabilityInfoContext returns incorrect result for parameter of private constructor in a public-only assembly #63853
    7.0.0
  • NullabilityInfoContext does not properly respect CodeAnalysis attribute on indexer property #63849
    7.0.0
  • NullabilityInfoContext returns incorrect result when code analysis attributes are used in a disabled context #63848
    7.0.0
  • NullabilityInfoContext returns incorrect result for some unannotated private members #63847
    7.0.0
  • NullabilityInfoContext reports incorrect result when mixing AllowNull and DisallowNull #63846
    7.0.0
  • NullabilityInfoContext does not report the correct nullability for method in generic base class. #63555
    7.0.0
  • Allow ref struct to contain ref fields #32060
    7.0.0
  • [mono] Test failed on windows: System.Reflection.Tests.AssemblyNameTests.GetAssemblyName_LockedFile #34492
    7.0.0
  • Assembly(Definition|Reference).GetAssemblyName() do not match handling of neutral culture of AssemblyName.GetAssemblyName() #28153
    Future
  • CoreCLR build fails without Ninja #64318
  • MAUI Startup Improvement #61941
    Future
  • Strange events from System.Runtime EventCounters under Linux #56695
    5.0.x
  • Deadlock with SystemEvents when application is shutdown by Restart Manager #62042
    7.0.0
  • SslStream client on Linux incorrectly reports that it is mutually authenticated #40314
    Future
  • Logging source generator should gracefully fail when special parameters incorrectly get passed as template parameter #64310
    7.0.0
  • JIT: Assert "Missing flags on tree" #64161
    7.0.0
  • Review FEATURE_CORESYSTEM #7411
    Future
  • 3.1 exes should be emitted as -pie enabled #45862
    5.0.x
  • [release/5.0] Unable to bulid release/5.0 out of the box due to nuget signature errors #57849
    5.0.x
  • Test failure Interop\\DisabledRuntimeMarshalling\\DisabledRuntimeMarshalling_NativeAssemblyDisabled\\DisabledRuntimeMarshalling_NativeAssemblyDisabled.cmd #64172
  • Assertion failed 'vnStore->VNExcIsSubset(nodeExcSet.GetLiberal(), operandsExcSet.GetLiberal())' during 'Do value numbering' #64208
  • Support file named 'NUL' #62943
  • .NET 6 FileStream fails with System.IO.IOException: 'The parameter is incorrect' when FILE_FLAG_NO_BUFFERING used #62851
    7.0.0
  • API Proposal: UnreachableException #35324
    Future
  • RegexReductionTests are failing in browser #64300
    7.0.0
  • ChannelReader.ReadAsync/ChannelWriter.WriteAsync don't return or throw when cancellation token is signaled #64051
    7.0.0
  • What is the purpose of hashing in a PDB Document? #63505
  • Ship runtime using DllImportGenerator #60212
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove workarounds for RemoteExecutor (dotnet/arcade#5865) #64360
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [wasm][debugger] Move the breakpoint line after applying changes #64359
    area-Debugger-mono
  • WIP diagnostics port #64358
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Add/use ArgumentException.ThrowIfNullOrEmpty #64357
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Removing `tiVerificationNeeded` in the JIT #64356
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ARM64: Avoid LEA for volatile IND #64354
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Run Pi tests on a different queue, which runs ARM32 tests #64353
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Merge release/6.0-maui branch back into release/6.0 #64352
    Servicing-consider, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add xarch `andn` #64350
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Ignore non-X509 certificates in SignedCms #64348
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Fix Issue #21678: Add Path.Exists -- to replace inefficient FileExists || DirectoryExists #64347
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Clean up RegexCode opcodes and debug-only tracing #64346
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Vector256.IsHardwareAccelerated to return true only on AVX2 #64345
  • [mono] Re-enable tests that call MakeGenericType with non-RuntimeType arguments #64344
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • [wip] Run tests on Android 32 #64341
    * NO MERGE *, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Set wasm debugger log level at execution time. #64339
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm] Fix WebSocket tests on NodeJS #64330
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 7.0.0
  • Move FabricBot generation scripts to dotnet/runtime #64324
    area-Meta
  • remove support for Ssl2 #64322
    area-System.Net.Security
  • 2 fixes related to commit/decommit #64316
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [JIT] Use byteCount when deciding what instruction sequence to use in genCodeForCpBlkUnroll #64315
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable ipv6 lookup tests when needed #64313
    area-System.Net
  • Fold inbox crypto into one assembly #64307
    area-System.Security
  • [release/6.0] add RID for Alpine 3.15 #64304
    Servicing-consider, area-Meta, 6.0.x

Merged

  • Fix several bugs in NullabilityInfoContext. #64143
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Moved AssemblyName helpers to managed (part 2) #63915
    area-System.Reflection
  • Add additional loop table asserts #64126
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add marshaler for TypeLoad failure cases #64317
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Disable RegexReductionTests on browser #64312
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Fix race conditions in SystemEvents shutdown logic #62773
    area-Microsoft.Win32, community-contribution
  • Support {Last}IndexOfAny with sets after {lazy} loops #64254
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Add gen folder moving gen projects from src folder #64231
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Fix IsMutuallyAuthenticated on Linux and OSX #63945
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Fixes bad log method generation in certain cases. #64311
    area-Extensions-Logging, 7.0.0
  • Remove usage of FEATURE_CORESYSTEM #63850
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [mono] Add some missing Internal.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe intr… #64314
  • Refactor FileStatus.Unix. #62721
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Update the managed type system to more gracefully fail when calling a varargs method. #64286
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix unique VNs for `ADDR`s #64230
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Implemented hierarchy of attributes. #64201
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/6.0-maui][mono] Recognize new names for Xamarin.iOS etc assemblies #64327
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Remove usage of codecvt from corerun #64157
    area-Host, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [mono] Recognize new names for Xamarin.iOS etc assemblies #64278
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Add UnreachableException #63922
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Explicitly specify four subdirectories for PMIPATH #64308
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix minor typos in GC documentation. #64298
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Ensure that canceled Task.Delays invoke continuations asynchronously from Cancel #64217
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, tenet-reliability, 7.0.0
  • When decommitting, leaving one instead of two pages in regions case. #64243
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix arm64/PInvoke so that NESTED_ENTRY/NESTED_END labels match. #64296
    community-contribution
  • Clarify purpose of PDB Document hashing #64306
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata

Updated

  • Simplify the creation of diagnostics using DiagnosticId #64250
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove CheckForOverflowUnderflow #63825
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [tests][mobile] Enable diagnostic_tracing for mobile runtime tests #60879
    area-System.Diagnostics, os-android
  • Expand System.Runtime.InteropServices.NFloat to support the APIs required by Xamarin #64234
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix generic method resolution in composite R2R images #64247
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • enable osr stress tests for libraries and add fixes #64116
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Trying to fix issue #63788: "NetworkChange.NetworkAddressChanged event leaks threads on Linux #63963
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • More cleanups in assembly loader area #63157
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Allow SslStream in ConnectCallback #63851
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Implement support to Set Next Instruction Pointer. #64114
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [mono] Optimize generic sharing for generic methods. #64129
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Add attributes for required members #64287
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices
  • #51371 fixed failing test in iossimulator #63877
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Cancel pending ReadableStream on Dispose #64285
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Override all `Read` methods in `NullTextReader` and `NullStreamReader` #64301
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [mono] Always store to allocas in OP_LLVM_OUTARG_VT #64303
    runtime-mono, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Fixes a few issues for dprintf on OSX #64076
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [API Implementation]: DirectoryInfo.CopyTo / Directory.Copy #62375
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Don't show the wasm functions on callstack when debugging managed code #64223
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [resubmit] Fix bug of FastReducer used in BigInteger.ModPow #55122
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Avoid an assert in ves_icall_RuntimeFieldInfo_SetValueInternal #64214
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Add IAsyncEnumerable support to TransformManyBlock #49264
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Add Match and isMatch ReadOnlySpan<char> overloads as well as Regex protected methods which expose ReadOnlySpan<char> to avoid allocations. #62509
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Use generic collections in System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter implementation #63315
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • [API Implementation]: Support for Intel SHA extensions #62999
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Move DllImportGenerator to use DisableRuntimeMarshalling for its blittable classification #64279
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Console.Unix: fix missing terminal configuration on SIGINT/SIGQUIT/SGCONT. #64200
    area-System.Console, community-contribution
  • [Codespaces] Make it possible to run wasm samples in the browser #64277
    area-Infrastructure
  • Check for CMAKE_C_COMPILER_ID not CXX #64226
  • [wasm][debugger] Support chrome debugging using chrome://inspect #63900
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Unify reading from procfs to get network related information #63696
    area-System.Net, 7.0.0
  • [WIP] Enable runtime tests to run on Android arm32 #51642
    os-android, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Skip AOT of Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.dll for WASM, due to out-of-memory issues in CI #63958
  • JIT: simple forward substitution pass #63720
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Throw during renegotiation if there is incomplete received TLS frame #64066
    area-System.Net.Security
  • WIP: CoreCLR runtime tests on Mono Windows x64. #64281
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wasm] Initial templates implementation #63683
  • JIT: Clone ADDR(LCL) for DUP #64171
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [resubmit] BigInteger parsing optimization for large decimal string #55121
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • 62606 Return fully qualified path from FileSystemEventArgs #63051
    area-System.IO, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • FileSystem.Unix: CopyFile: use copy_file_range on Linux. #64264
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Improve Directory.Move and DirectoryInfo.MoveTo #63675
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Fix ReadyToRun loading on Apple Silicon #64104
    area-ReadyToRun-coreclr, community-contribution
  • issue-22928 Add ImmutableArray Span-based APIs #61196
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Implement TLS1.3 delayed client cert requests on Linux #64268
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux
  • Equalize promoted #64206
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Build ILCompiler NuGet packages #63212
    * NO MERGE *, area-Infrastructure-installer
  • [release/6.0] Update zip extraction to never throw any exceptions when the LastWriteTime update fails #64192
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO.Compression, 6.0.3
  • [Mono][Test] Collapse mono runtime tests into single builds using global-build-job template #62863
    area-Infrastructure
  • fix ping with SendIpHeader on FreeBSD #63531
    area-System.Net, os-freebsd
  • SPMI no ASMDiff between Checked and Release #61335
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 7.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-26
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM]: Outstanding tasks tracking issue #1828
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Question: ILScanner and Generics test #1783
  • [Native AOT]: how to make ILC not to append these libs #1832
  • Limitations that we're not planning to address right now #155

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unable to use package assets cache due to I/O error on build #23600
  • Impossible to add .resx to .Net 6 MVC or Razor Pages project to localize the project #23605
  • VS2019 can't load analyzer project + rebuild skips all after trying (VS2022 installed) --> emscripten dependency missing #23596
  • Output is no longer displayed #23591
  • Running dotnet run on a console app has no output #23616
  • Disabled including binaries for generators in latest .net sdk preview #23590

Closed

  • Appsettings environments don group in Microsoft.NET.Sdk.Worker #23106
  • Cannot debug asp.net core 6.0 project, in Visual Studio 2022 (Windows 10) #22628
  • VS 2022 New ASP .NET Core Web Project fails to start with "Process with an id of xx is not running" #22629
  • "dotnet publish" not exposing all dependencies to publish folder #22620
  • Determine improvements to our codeflow, arcade, and signing process #22149
    7.0.1xx
  • installation rollback - dotnet workload install android #23573
    Discussion

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'main' #23604
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1573733 #23536
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Allow print rollback when non-admin. #23326
    Area-Workloads, 6.0.3xx
  • Switch to 1ES pools for publishing #23575
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • GenerateRuntimeConfig now uses stream serialization instead of loading file in memory #22576
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Backport System.CommandLine updates to 6.0.3xx #23345
    Area-CLI, 6.0.3xx

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-26
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • generic constraint: where T : ref struct #1148
    Working Set
  • Generic operators support in C#. #813
    Likely Never
  • Proposal: User-defined positional patterns #4131
  • Lightweight documentation comment syntax #2394
  • [Proposal] Required Properties #3630
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Static abstract members in interfaces #4436
    Working Set
  • Idea : Property References #1677

PullRequests

Created

  • Support for ref struct as generic arguments #5689
  • Update required members spec #5688

Merged

  • Update the set of unresolved questions in utf8-string-literals.md #5685

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Consider grouping some fields of SyntaxFormattingOptions into a struct #59090
  • Rename CSharpFormattingOptions2 members to match editorconfig names/flag names. #59089
    Backlog
  • Provide a way to efficiently get the list of global aliases in a compilation. #59088
  • FAR on a parameter should find all call sites passing value to that parameter #59087
  • Typing `///` in top-level statements inserts a documentation comment template #59081
  • Sync Namespaces is calling some kind of code cleanup #59080
    17.2
  • Questions about SemanticEdit related public API. #59078
    17.2

Closed

  • Decompiled enums without `[Flags]` could have their values displayed in hex form #59056
    Backlog
  • Add a feature that we can hide this bar #58979
  • RE0001 improperly handles string formatting hole in source suppression #59072
  • Remove reflection based code in VisualStudioDiagnosticAnalyzerProvider #59076
    17.2
  • Nullable references: Deconstruction of valueTuple in foreach removes nullability of valueTuple items if collection uses System.Linq #39736
    Compiler.Next
  • IAsyncEnumerable codegen doesn't properly cleanup after end of iteration which causes memory leaking #58444
    17.2

PullRequests

Created

  • Format document after each provider #59091
    Area-IDE
  • Remove extra logic to see if users are squatting on keywords #59086
    Area-IDE
  • Insert documentation comments only on supported declarations #59084
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Use reference assembly instead of reflection for Extension Manager APIs #59079
    Area-IDE
  • Update StreamJsonRpc #59073
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Move global options to EditorFeature layer #59071
    Area-IDE
  • Avoid assuming containing assembly is from source in DefiniteAssignment #59069
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Formatting options refactoring - step 3 #58904
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage, Next
  • Seal Equals(obj) on Diagnostic #58961
    Area-Analyzers, Next
  • Code Generation options refactoring follow-up #59022
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Clean up diagnostic and solution crawler options #59083
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required, Next
  • Support codespace in dotnet/roslyn #59074
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Editing the start delimeter of a raw-string-literal will update the end of the literal as well. #59082
    Area-IDE
  • IDE response to raw string literals #58846
    Area-IDE
  • Add UnitTestingGlobalOptions to External Access to make global options accessible to Unit Testing #59070
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #59068
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Fix foreach deconstruction nullability #52722
    Area-Compilers, Community, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, Next
  • Adjust reflection based code in VisualStudioDiagnosticAnalyzerProvide… #59075
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add additional tests for raw interpolated strings. #59041
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix regex analyzer title #59077
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • [semi-auto-props]: Refactor and rename 'AccessingAutoPropertyFromConstructor' #58832
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • AsyncIterator: clear Current upon exit #58949
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Async Streams, Next

Updated

  • declaration errors #58507
    Area-Compilers
  • SignatureHelp: guess best overload for incomplete invocations #31843
    Area-IDE, Feature Request, Backlog
  • Json parsing #42864
    Area-IDE, Need Design Review
  • Use record param docs as property summary docs #58960
    Area-Compilers
  • Make sure Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Collections builds with net6.0 #57665
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #59092
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Filter cancellation exceptions in generator driver #58843
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.2
  • Remove dependency on EditorFeatures from Remote.ServiceHub project #59059
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • Function pointer calling convention IDE support #59062
    Area-IDE, Community
  • [17.0] Report errors for structs with missing field initializers and implicit parameterless constructor #59055
    Area-Compilers, 17.0
  • Correctly handle additional inputs to user-defined conversions #58730
    Area-Compilers
  • Deconstruction of default literal: wrapping up feature #54868
    Area-Compilers
  • Don't remove cast when converting method group to object #58920
    Area-IDE, Community
  • List patterns: Recreate the decision dag for lowering #59019
    Area-Compilers
  • Razor snippets #58857
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Json features #59034
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • Set OutputEncoding to UTF8 #59032
    Area-Compilers
  • Json parsing with tests. #42873
    Area-IDE
  • Clarify semi-required properties #59047
    Area-IDE
  • Enable null on UseExplicitTypeCodeFixProvider #58866
    Area-IDE
  • Respect ReportSuppressedDiagnostics option for DiagnosticSuppressor #53045
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, Community
  • tweak diagnostic create warning level documentation wording #53718
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, Community

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Discussion] [Breaking change]: SignalR Hub methods try to resolve parameters from DI #39795
    Discussions
  • Evaluate Migrating Deleted NPM/Jest Web.JS Tests to Selenium E2E Test Suite #39793
  • Improve endpoint metadata debugging by overriding ToString #39792
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Product Unit Recommendation On How To Cache Bust Blazor WASM Files #39791
  • Perf improvement: https #39788
  • Upgrading Authentication.JwtBearer 6.0.1 throws null exception at runtime #39787
  • blazor cs1503 cannot convert from System.DateTime? to System.DateTime, but it works fine #39785
  • Load a script from an external JavaScript file (.js) collocated with a component #39784
  • WebApplicationFactory<T>.CreateClient() fails when using app.Urls.Add() in minimal api. #39777
  • Blazor WASM Auth force token renew #39775
  • BlazorWebAssemblyLazyLoad By Dependency Injection #39774
  • Use ReadOnlySpan<char> equivalents for string methods? #39771
    Backlog
  • SignalR : Want to send signal to client when it reconnects to server #39770
  • Razor Pages - ModelBinder Improperly Fills Dictionary with Form Values #39767

Closed

  • Inject dependencies into SignalR hub method #16686
    7.0-preview2
  • Strange behaviour of [CallerFilePath] #39772
  • Perf regression: json #39768
  • [API Proposal]: Add DisplayAttribute.Size #39779
  • HttpMethodMatcherPolicy.ApplyAsync ArgumentNullException #39398
    7.0-preview1
  • Test failure - "DefaultReconnectionHandler.test - invokes update on each attempt" #39758
  • Publish test results for Blazor JS tests #39727
    7.0-preview2

PullRequests

Created

  • Fork component analyzers #39796
    area-blazor
  • [7.0-preview1] Update precedence of templates for 7.0 #39794
    area-mvc
  • Update Bug Report Duplicate Issue Search Link #39789
    area-infrastructure
  • Update JwtBearerOptions and OpenIdConnectOptions #39782
    area-security
  • Move CredScanSuppressions.json to root of repo #39780
    blocked, area-infrastructure
  • Avoid modifying the JavaScriptEncoder on SystemTextJsonOutputFormatter #39778
    area-mvc

Merged

  • Add support for DI in Hub methods #34047
    area-signalr, 7.0-preview2
  • Update precedence of templates for 7.0 #39783
    7.0-preview1
  • Use IndexOfAny(char, char) with Span #39743
    area-mvc, area-blazor, feature-routing, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • Use placeholders for password fields #39776
    7.0-preview1
  • Forward port template localization fix #39662
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview1
  • Fix: HttpMethodMatcherPolicy.ApplyAsync ArgumentNullException #39759
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • Remove Web.JS Jest Tests #39763
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview1
  • Bump log4js from 6.3.0 to 6.4.0 in /src/SignalR/clients/ts/FunctionalTests #39686
    area-signalr, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies, 7.0-preview1
  • Bump node-fetch from 2.6.5 to 2.6.7 in /src/Components/Web.JS #39751
    area-blazor, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Switch to dynamic cert gen for tests #39685
    area-security
  • define RouteValuesAddress .ToString () #39753
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Remove Interop build step #39553
    area-infrastructure, area-grpc

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Why the maxVersion is 5.0, should it be 6.0? #2830

PullRequests

Merged

  • Update SOS to resolve first level byref fields #2829
    .NET 7.0

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Support configurability in opening external URLs #4338
  • Toolbar menu items are no longer rendered in MAUI P12 #4337
  • DisplayAlert crashes an app if executed in a page constructor #4336
  • Shell AppTheme binding not working (p11/p12) #4335
  • Native iOS Application Build broken when referencing iOs libraries #4334
  • Turn "initialization" into a first-class citizen in the mapper. #4330
  • .NET MAUI Windows target publishing/archiving #4329
  • CBPeripheralsEventArgs unreachable #4328
  • Blazor with maui can not use <InputSelect> or <select> #4325

Closed

  • [Windows] ProgressBar not rendering #4092
  • [Bug] Custom namespace schemas not working #3027
  • Need recipe file #3928
  • Publishing new MAUI Blazor app fails for win-x64 on Windows 10 using net6.0-windows-10.0.19041 #3493
  • The default MAUI and MAUI-Blazor projects do not work when published for Windows. #4010
  • MaUI blazor desktop application can not publish on windows 11 preview 22523 #3876
  • [Bug] Doesn't work when I try to debug in Release mode #3007
  • Maui App only starts with visual studio debugger #2583
  • [Bug] Project Build Error #2461
  • "Getting started" MAUI App does not run on Windows #3625
  • [Bug] Can't run published WinUI app. #1557
  • Binding Command on ImageButton not working #4312
  • Button Command not firing #4162
  • [Bug] VS2022 Preview 4 deploys to iOS device but does not debug #2520
  • [Bug] VS2022 Preview 4 won't create working MAUI apps #2571
  • Pre11, Visual Studio 2022 Mac- "The application has not been built" error #3961
  • Preview 12 and VS 2022 for Mac #4313
  • Grid Column Content Cut Off / Width Incorrect. #3853
  • GridLayout.RowSpacing is not removed from available space when doing calculations #3545
    6.0.200-preview.11

PullRequests

Created

  • Move Xaml.VisualDiagnostics to Maui.Core #4333
    partner/ui-tools
  • Add xplat OpenMauiAsset extension method #4323

Merged

  • Make Essentials lifecycle registration happen by default #4221
  • First pass at porting doc comments from Forms API docs #4099
    area/docs 📓
  • [Windows] Fix issue not rendering ProgressBar control #4191
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟
  • Implement Eval method in WebViewHandlers #4284
    partner/webview2, area/controls 🎮
  • [Housekeeping] Validate Button Command property #4324
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Modify existing rectangle rather than creating a new one #4321
  • Account for spacing when determining available space for star rows/columns #3871
    area/layout 🔲, 6.0.200-preview.13
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #4322
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [ci] Target the Mac internal-macOS-11 hosted agent pool #4241
  • Introduce IPlatformApplication #4320
    partner/ui-tools

Updated

  • Add drag-drop item reordering to CollectionView #3767 #3768
    t/enhancement ☀️, area/collectionview 📃
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #4339
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Catalyst] Fix OnPlatform on macOS #3763
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, area/Xaml </>, do-not-merge
  • Update Maui.Graphics #4301
  • Support opening a new window in iOS Blazor WebView #4268
    area/blazor 🕸️, platform/iOS 🍎
  • [iOS] Implement VerticalTextAlignment property in Label #3714
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮
  • Update template so you can find it under Windows as well #2484
    area/templates 📄, community ✨, 6.0.200-preview.13
  • [iOS, Android, Windows] Implement Border properties in ImageButton #3641
    area/controls 🎮
  • [iOS] Update DatePickerHandler and TimePickerHandler #3761
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮
  • Shell page dependency injection now uses IServiceProvider.GetService() #4281

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Missing link efcore-manage-schemas #27290
  • TemporalAsOf with NoTrackingWithIdentityResolution #27289
  • How to Delete Children Of Parent manually from db with deletion behaviour Cascade Delete with required FK? #27286

Closed

  • Test: Convert query tests to conditional theory #27229
    7.0.0
  • check keyless entity for null server side evaluation #27242
  • .NET6 - `null` "provider" after `AddSingleton<IMethodCallTranslatorPlugin, ...>()` #27276
  • Max with 0 result give error Sequence contains no elements when using .Max() or .MaxAsync() #18955
    3.1.1
  • Avoid duplicated subquery when translating LINQ intermediate projections #27285
  • Issue with Scaffold-DbContext #27180
  • Test Aggregate_over_subquery_in_group_by_projection is non-deterministic #27278
    7.0.0
  • Average_Grouped_from_LINQ_101 is non-deterministic #27155
    7.0.0
  • Reverse_in_subquery_via_pushdown is non-deterministic #27152
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] Query: Match correct predicate structure to convert apply to join #27292
    Servicing-consider, 6.0.x
  • Fix parameter type mapping for Sqlite #27291
  • Check for updates on nuget.org #27288
  • [release/6.0] Query: Convert single result subquery comparison to null to Any operation #27284
    Servicing-consider, 6.0.x

Merged

  • [release/2.1] Stop building w/ VS2017 in CI #27233
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • Fix to #27229 - Test: Convert query tests to conditional theory #27274
  • Bump Microsoft.Data.SqlClient from 4.0.0 to 4.0.1 #27287
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Start flowing Microsoft.Data.SqlClient again #27282
  • Fix non-deterministic tests that fail on postgres #27280
    auto-merge

Updated

  • [release/2.1] Move off expiring machine pools #26794
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • Fix ValueGenerated On Add Or Update, , make ValueGeneratedOnUpdate() and ValueGeneratedOnAddOrUpdate() working #26713
  • Change timer from method variable to property of SqlConnectioninteral #26495
    waiting-for-response
  • Case sensitive parameters 18861 #26287
    waiting-for-response

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Aspnetcore doesn't look for linux-musl nupkgs when building on linux-musl platform #13119
  • SBRP moved even when location set by --with-packages is read-only #13118

Closed

  • Issue opening/installing .NET 6.0.10, 3.1.416, 5.0.404 x64 from the installer pkg on macOS 12.2 (21D48) (Monterey RC) #13117

PullRequests

Created

  • Updates to produce Microsoft.DotNet.Common.ProjectTemplates.2.1/6.0 in source-build #13122
    ask-mode
  • Remove non-shipping project template from installer #13120
